Translations.Text: Simmwe mwabatta, naye mazima Katonda y’e yabatta, era bwe wakanyuga, si ggwe wakanyuga, naye mazima Katonda y’eyakanyuga, era abeere nga agezesa abakkiriza olugezesa olulungi n’ekikolwa ekyo, mazima Katonda awulira nnyo, mumanyi
E byo byebyo (mubimanye), era mumanyire ddala nti, mazima Katonda anafuya enkwe z’a bakaafiiri

(Mwe abakaafiiri) bwe muba nga musaba Katonda kusalawo, okusalawo kuzze, era bwe muneekomako, ekyo kye kirungi gye muli, naye bwe munaddamu, nga naffe tuddamu, ate ekibinja kya mmwe tekigenda kubagasa kintu kyonna, ne bwe kiba kinene kitya, anti mazima Katonda ali wamu n’abakkiriza
Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mugondere Katonda n’omubakawe, temumuvangako, ate nga muwulira (bya bagamba)
Temubeera nga abo ab’agamba nti tuwulidde so nga tebawulira
Mazima e kiramu e kisinga obubi ewa Katonda, be ba kiggala, ba kasiru abo abatategeera
Singa Katonda yabamanyaamu akalungi konna, yaalibawulizza, ate ne bwe yaalibawulizza, baaliwuguse nebava ku mazima

Abange mmwe abakkiriza, mwanukule Katonda n’omubaka bwabayita okujja eri ekyo ekibawa obulamu, era mumanye nti, mazima Katonda, assa ekyawula wakati w’omuntu n’omutimagwe, so ng’ate bulijjo, mazima gyali gye mugenda okukunganyizibwa
Mutye e kikemo e kitagenda kukwata ku abo abeeyisa obubi mu mmwe bokka, era mumanye nti mazima Katonda muyitirivu wa kubonereza
